title: [Grawood Farmstead, Town]
description: Passing through this section of town finds the air saturated with scents both sweet and savory.  A bright yellow building seems to be at least partially the source, as light from within the building offers a view of dining patrons.

Passing through this section of town finds the air saturated with scents both sweet and savory.  A bright yellow building seems to be at least partially the source, as people can be seen coming and going from its front door, releasing flavorful aromas each time they pass.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
